opennlp.ccg.parse.postagger.ml
Class POSPriorModel

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.ConditionalProbabilityTable
      opennlp.ccg.parse.postagger.ml.POSPriorModel

public class POSPriorModel
extends ConditionalProbabilityTable

(c) (2009) Dennis N. Mehay

Author:
Dennis N. Mehay Model for predicting p(POS | word). Uses an ARPA-formatted SRILM-trained "unigram" factored LM for this, where each "unigram" is a bundle of word:pos.

Field Summary
 List<Pair<String,String>> attrVals
          Re-usable list for attr-val pairs of word-pos-supertag inputs to the prior model (i.e., for predicting p(STag | word, POS).
